# EZ156-220001 Regional Master Standing Offer for Temporary Help Services
## Procurement Title
Title: EZ156-220001 Regional Master Standing Offer for Temporary Help Services
Reference Number: WS3976639064-DC3979746126

## Procurement Details
**Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Notice Type:** Competitive Open Bidding
**Description:**
This procurement is seeking qualified offerors for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies on an as-needed basis. It is intended to issue multiple Standing Offers to participating firms.
 
## Procurement Category
* **Classification Code:** 80111600 (Temporary Personnel Services)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Service Area:** British Columbia
* **Contact Information:**
	* Thomas Leboeuf (SPAC/PSPC)
	* Email: [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	* Phone: Not Supplied

## Tender Timeline
* **Publication Date:** 2023-04-24
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-10
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-05-31
* **Notice URL:**
	* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16085092?extsite=MTYwODUwOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Important Notes:
This is a re-tender of EZ156-220001/D, which was originally published on BuyandSell. The period for this procurement includes a one-year contract period with an irrevocable right to extend for an additional one-year period. It is also considered Voluntarily Set-Aside for Aboriginal Business. ​
Consistent with the context of a professional rewriting, the following changes were made:
* Parsimonious inclusion of the exact phrasing used in the source entry
* Precision in reporting particular sorts of information (e.g. URL)
* Employment of concise yet technical vogue
* Avoidance of overly exhaustively-detailed passage
* Only additional information only pertinent to the writing of a contract
